subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bellegarde-sur-Valserine is a French town that has gussied itself up for the arrival of the Tour de France for the first time in its history.
snippet: Bellegarde-sur-Valserine is a French town that has gussied itself up for the arrival of the Tour de France for the first time in its history.
